browser_language.Name: Browser Language
browser_language.Description: The language of the users browser. It will come from the accept-language header or the navigator.language if the former is null.

country.Name: Country
country.Description: The users country from their IP.

date.Name: Date
date.Description: The date. It accepts any valid date format, but the suggested format is YYYY-MM-DD.

day_of_week.Name: Day of Week
day_of_week.Description: The day of the week, Monday to Sunday. 1 is Monday, 7 is Sunday.

host_name_by_address.Name: Host Name By Address
host_name_by_address.Description: The users host name (DNS lookup of the users IP address).

query_parameter.Name: Query Parameter
query_parameter.Description: The query parameter after the ? in the URL.

referer.Name: Referer
referer.Description: The website that the user just came from.

scanned_qr.Name: Scanned QR
scanned_qr.Description: Whether the QR code was scanned or not. Novu.link appends a utm_medium parameter to the URL when the app-povided QR code is scanned.

time.Name: Time
time.Description: The time of day. This time is relative to UTC, meaning that its perfect for fixed times that are not subject to timezone changes.

total_times_scanned.Name: Total Times Scanned
total_times_scanned.Description: The total amount of times the QR code has been scanned or the link has been visited.

total_times_scanned_per_i_p.Name: Total Times Scanned Per IP
total_times_scanned_per_i_p.Description: The total amount of times the QR code has been scanned or the link has been visited, per unique IP.

device_orientation.Name: Device Orientation
device_orientation.Description: The users device orientation. Either landscape-primary, landscape-secondary (upside-down), portrait-primary, or portrait-secondary (upside-down).

supports_geolocation.Name: Supports Geolocation
supports_geolocation.Description: The users support of geolocation. This returns true if the users browser supports getting the users location.

user_time.Name: User Time
user_time.Description: The time of day relative to the users current timezone.

is_bot.Name: Is Bot
is_bot.Description: Whether the user is a bot or not.

moon_phase.Name: Moon Phase
moon_phase.Description: The current phase of the moon.
